products.name: Draped Dress
products.brandedName: Vince Draped Dress
products.description: Introducing the Vince Draped Dress, a stunning piece from the iconic brand, Vince. This dress, situated in the category of women's clothing and specifically dresses, is the epitome of effortless elegance.Inspired by the natural beauty of California, Vince is renowned for its mastery of simplicity and laid-back staples. With a vision deeply rooted in casual cool vibes, Vince's timeless designs are a testament to their dedication to creating wardrobe essentials.The Vince Draped Dress showcases a mesmerizing optic white color, exuding a sense of purity and grace. It features a mock collar that adds a touch of sophistication to the overall design. The elasticized waist offers a comfortable and flattering fit, accentuating your curves in all the right places. With a tiered skirt, this dress effortlessly flows and moves as you stride, creating an eye-catching silhouette that demands attention. Falling approximately 48 inches from the shoulder to the hem, this dress is perfect for various occasions, whether it's a daytime gathering or an evening soirÃ©e.Adding a charming detail, the keyhole back with a self-tie closure adds a playful touch to the dress, ensuring an alluring look from every angle. Crafted from 100% cotton, this dress offers exceptional comfort and breathability.Washing this garment is a breeze; simply toss it in the machine and enjoy its effortless maintenance. Imported with utmost care, this piece reflects the quality and attention to detail that Vince is famous for.Embrace the graceful simplicity of the Vince Draped Dress and set a new standard for laid-back elegance. Elevate your wardrobe with the essence of California-inspired chic.

products.name: Mind Games Blockade Silver Knight Extrait de Parfum
products.brandedName: Mind Games Blockade Silver Knight Extrait de Parfum
products.unbrandedName: Mind Games Blockade Silver Knight Extrait de Parfum
products.description: What it is: A bold scent from MIND GAMES, a fragrance line that transports you to the crucial moments of competition. Fragrance story: Blockade reimagines our perception of the enemy. Removing our inner thoughts of doubt and indecision, Blockade puts our weakness to work for our advancement. Drawing vitality from warm heart notes rooted in leather, oud and amber, Blockade prompts us to view our vices, vulnerabilities, and fragility as a source of transformation. Shifting the mindset of what was once possible, a vivacious freshness takes hold as mango, spicy pepper, and tomato leaf permeate what was once impenetrable. The contrasting natures of the fragrance inspire you to move forward in pursuit, ready to seize the next opportunity, confident in a new found resolve, and security. Smooth, calculated, and dynamic, the alluring scents of Blockade make it a fragrance that inspires action and growth, in a sophisticated and timeless offering.'I envisioned the strong metallic armor of a knight brought to life. A mix of crushed leaves, ginger and pepper from Madagascar accompany ambery woods to relay a strong heart, with a juicy mango grounding the fragrance. The use of Boya enhances depth and inserts a narcotic addiction to the potent scent.' - Christelle Laprade, PerfumerStyle: Woody, aromaticNotes:- Top: mango skin, pink pepper, tomato leaf, bergamot capua- Middle: lavender, mango flower, watery cyclamen, star anise- Base: cuir velours DI, patchouli, ambrostar, oud 3.4 oz. Made in the USA

About the designer: Luxury ready-to-wear brand, Magda Butrym, was founded in 2014 by designer Magdalena Butrym and Aleksandra Halemba. Magda Butrym combines modern design with traditional craftsmanship creating clothes that make women feel effortlessly cool. The brand marries technically sublime feminine knits with hard leather details. The collections features hand plaited leathers, hand-woven textiles, hand-knitted fabrics and embroidered ornaments. The carefully crafted and unique details in each piece reflects the brandâ€™s passion and commitment to design.

products.unbrandedName: Yellow Gold, Diamond, Morganite And Watermelon Tourmaline Necklace
products.description: Jacquie Aiche specialises in selecting magical stones that bring vibrance, symbolism and whimsy to the world of fine jewellery, and this necklace is a particularly exquisite example of the designers creative ethos. Suspended from a delicate yellow gold chain, the pendant assembles morganite and watermelon tourmaline - two gems that captivate effortlessly with their unique colourings.
